actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that gain or loss will not be recognized on transfers between spouses or incident to divorce.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that no gain or loss shall be recognized on a transfer of property between spouses or incident to divorce. Treats such transferred property as a gift and provides that the transferee's basis in the property shall be the same as the transferor.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that gain or loss will not be recognized on transfers between spouses or incident to divorce.
